title: Ocean Shores
contents: The sun was shining, kites were flying, and the seagulls were enjoying the little nibbles they could find.

title: Mailbox Peak
contents: This hike was by the far the most difficult hike I have ever done! If you take the Old trail be ready for a beating if you are not a serious hiker like me.

title: Roadtrips
contents: Went on the roadtrip for 14 days with my besties. We saw a couple shows at the Shakespeare Festival in Ashlund, Oregon. Seeing the Grand Canyon was amazing and I even dangled my feet off the edge even though I have a GREAT FEAR of heights. And, we finished the roadtrip off with YellowStone, seeing buffalo, elk, and Old Faithful!
